sentences.sentence: However, you will see in the next steps that some correspondences can also be applied between classes linked with simple associations.
sentences.translation: 尽管如此，在下一步骤中你将看到，有些通讯还可以用于由简单关联联系起来的类。

sentences.sentence: Last but not least, says Haefner, be professional and concise in all of your correspondences.
sentences.translation: 最后也是最重要的，哈伊·弗纳说：专业和简洁的在你所有的对应关系。

sentences.sentence: You probably prefer to define the correspondences at a class-level rather than for each of the instances.
sentences.translation: 你可能偏向于在类的级别上定义通讯，而不是为每一个实例定义。
